column5: dont worry people, mine are soon to come!
Where the hell are you guys going to catch these things?
where the hell am i gunna catch em? well thats a big fat secret bud!
Got over 50 lbs last night, and just finished cleaning those little buggers. Might go out agian later in the week.
your my hero dude! pm me a general location... i'll pin point the spot! lol.
Well it really depends if u feel like driving all the way up here, those were from a Lake Superior trib...

Never thought to take pics of smelts here.  My arm is still sore cleaning them a few nights ago.  There is alot more smelt this year than many years I have seen but still not the same as in the late 60's when a 6x6 smelt net would break bringing up one load of smelt and you could load one bushel basket full with one catch.  The smelt are a younger class this year with only a few of the mature older ones.  I just can't wait until next year so I will only have to clean 60 or so for some good frozen meals.  Take care....Rob!
good, i live in the sault.
